dublinCore.dc:title: 113 SRES 283 ATS: To constitute the majority party’s membership on certain committees for the One Hundred Thirteenth Congress, or until their successors are chosen.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Reid submitted the following resolution; which was considered and agreed to

form.official-title: To constitute the majority party’s membership on certain committees for the One Hundred Thirteenth Congress, or until their successors are chosen.

section.text: That the following shall constitute the majority party’s membership on the following committees for the One Hundred Thirteenth Congress, or until their successors are chosen:

committee-appointment-paragraph.header: Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation:
committee-appointment-paragraph.text: Mr. Rockefeller (Chairman), Mrs. Boxer, Mr. Nelson, Ms. Cantwell, Mr. Pryor, Mrs. McCaskill, Ms. Klobuchar, Mr. Warner, Mr. Begich, Mr. Blumenthal, Mr. Schatz, Mr. Markey, Mr. Booker.

committee-appointment-paragraph.header: Committee on Environment and Public Works:
committee-appointment-paragraph.text: Mrs. Boxer (Chairman), Mr. Baucus, Mr. Carper, Mr. Cardin, Mr. Sanders, Mr. Whitehouse, Mr. Udall of New Mexico, Mr. Merkley, Mrs. Gillibrand, Mr. Booker.

committee-appointment-paragraph.header: Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship:
committee-appointment-paragraph.text: Ms. Landrieu (Chairman), Mr. Levin, Ms. Cantwell, Mr. Pryor, Mr. Cardin, Mrs. Shaheen, Mrs. Hagan, Ms. Heitkamp, Mr. Markey, Mr. Booker.
